snippet: Relatives of accident victims asked the automaker to stop drivers from using vehicles with faulty ignition switches until they are repaired.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of accident victims asked the automaker to stop drivers from using vehicles with faulty ignition switches until they are repaired.

headline.main: Families Urge G.M. to Get Defective Vehicles Off the Road

keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
keywords.name: organizations
